generateActor() - Method in class Grid
The generateActor method sets the initial locations of the Character and the Exit.
generateDirections() - Method in class Grid
The generateDirection method randomly generates an integer array list containing numbers 0-3.

The generateMaze method randomly generates the maze.
get(Location) - Method in class Grid
The get method gets the Actor at a given location.
getcc() - Method in class Grid
The getcc method returns the initial x-coordinate of the Character.
getCharacter() - Method in class Grid
The getCharacter method returns the Character in the grid.
getCol() - Method in class Character
The getRow method returns x-coordinate of the Character
getCol() - Method in class Exit
The getCol method returns the x-coordinate of the exit.
getcr() - Method in class Grid
The getcr method returns the initial y-coordinate of the Character.
getDirection() - Method in class Actor
The getDirection method returns the direction of the Actor's movement.
getDirection(Character, Exit) - Method in class Direction
The getDirection method finds the direction from the Character to the Exit.
getExit() - Method in class Grid
The getExit method returns the Exit in the grid.
getGrid() - Method in class Actor
The getGrid method returns the current grid.

The get Location method returns the location of the Actor.

The getNumCols returns the number of columns in the grid.
getNumRows() - Method in class Grid
The getNumRows returns the number of rows in the grid.

getRow() - Method in class Character
The getRow method returns y-coordinate of the Character
getRow() - Method in class Exit
The getRow method returns the y-coordinate of the exit.
Grid - Class in <Unnamed>
The grid class creates a grid of Actors.
Grid(int, int) - Constructor for class Grid
The constructor creates a 2D array for the grid and adds Actors to it.
GRID_SIZE - Static variable in class GridPanel
 
GridPanel - Class in <Unnamed>
The GridPanel displays the grid, the actors in the grid, and defines the Character's movements.

The constructor sets the grid.
